items.name: case activePhoneCall
items.desc: Unable to record due to an active phone call.

items.name: case attemptToStartInRecordingState
items.desc: Attempted to start a recording that’s already in a recording state.

items.name: case attemptToStopNonRecording
items.desc: Attempted to stop a recording that’s not in a recording state.

items.name: case broadcastInvalidSession
items.desc: Attempted to start a broadcast without a prior session.

items.name: case broadcastSetupFailed
items.desc: The broadcast set up failed.

items.name: case carPlay
items.desc: Failed to start recording because CarPlay is active.

items.name: case codeSuccessful
items.desc: Successfully saved the recording to the Camera Roll.

items.name: case contentResize
items.desc: Recording interrupted by multitasking and content resizing.

items.name: case disabled
items.desc: Recording disabled via parental controls.

items.name: case entitlements
items.desc: Recording failed due to missing entitlements.

items.name: case failed
items.desc: Recording error occurred.

items.name: case failedApplicationConnectionInterrupted
items.desc: The recording failed because the app’s connection was interrupted.

items.name: case failedApplicationConnectionInvalid
items.desc: The recording failed because the app’s connection is invalid.

items.name: case failedAssetWriterExportCanceled
items.desc: The recording failed because the user canceled the export.

items.name: case failedAssetWriterExportFailed
items.desc: The recording failed due to an error exporting the movie.

items.name: case failedAssetWriterFailedToSave
items.desc: The recording failed due to an asset writer failure.

items.name: case failedAssetWriterInWrongState
items.desc: The recording failed because the asset writer is in an invalid state.

items.name: case failedIncorrectTimeStamps
items.desc: The recording failed due to malformed start and end time intervals.

items.name: case failedMediaServicesFailure
items.desc: The recording failed due to a mediaservices daemon failure.

items.name: case failedNoAssetWriter
items.desc: The recording failed because there is no asset writer available.

items.name: case failedNoMatchingApplicationContext
items.desc: The context identifier doesn’t match the app identifier.

items.name: case failedToObtainURL
items.desc: The recording failed due to a failure to obtain the URL.

items.name: case failedToProcessFirstSample
items.desc: The recording failed because the asset writer failed to process the first media sample.

items.name: case failedToRemoveFile
items.desc: The recording failed because the temporary file wasn’t removed.

items.name: case failedToStartCaptureStack
items.desc: The system failed to configure the app for A/V recording.

items.name: case failedToStart
items.desc: Recording failed to start.

items.name: case failedToSave
items.desc: The recording failed to save.

items.name: case filePermissions
items.desc: The recording failed due to a file permission error.

items.name: case insufficientStorage
items.desc: Not enough storage available on the device.

items.name: case interrupted
items.desc: Recording interrupted by another app.

items.name: case invalidParameter
items.desc: The recording failed because of an invalid parameter.

items.name: case photoFailure
items.desc: Failed saving the video the Camera Roll.

items.name: case recordingInvalidSession
items.desc: Attempted to start an invalid recording session.

items.name: case systemDormancy
items.desc: Recording forced to end by the user pressing the power button.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: Error cause unknown.

items.name: case userDeclined
items.desc: User declined recording request.

items.name: case videoMixingFailure
items.desc: The recording failed due to an A/V mixing failure.
